Vykos: That's LORD Vykos for you. You would do well to remember 
that...

He seemed annoyed at the unformalities of Hydras, but said nothing 
more.

Vykos: Your slaves can stay here for now. Come inside, let's chat.

He led Hydras to a small but cozy room, where Lord Vykos sat on a 
throne of decepticon-purple velvet and metal.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras Puppet::
> 
> "Yes... I heard a lot things a lot about you Vykos... A lot things 
> that could do a predacon proud... And at this time, I should guess 
> that I'm Megatron and Galvatron fused in Hydras..." "hissed Puppet 
> Hydras while he narrowed his eyes who added"If my guard annoyed 
you, 
> they can remain outside, in order to chat more... confortable... "
> 
> Puppet Hydras eyes' didn't expressed anyway.
> 
>

I

a

a

guards

stay
